actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide grants for pilot early childhood and family educational programs.
short_title: Pilot Early Childhood and Family Education Act

summary.text: Pilot Early Childhood and Family Education Act - Provides for a program of grants for the establishment and operation of early childhood and family educational programs for fiscal years 1980 and 1981. Directs that each local educational agency receiving a grant under this Act establish an Early Childhood and Family Education Advisory Committee to provide local parental participation in the design, development and supervision of such programs.

titles.title: Pilot Early Childhood and Family Education Act
A bill to provide grants for pilot early childhood and family educational programs.
